synopsis.text:
When Manji's quest to confront his true adversary is interrupted by formidable foes, he finds himself locked in combat with the pulse-manipulating Da Cang and the devoted sea sorceress Hai Wen Xiang, a loyal follower of Kuiba. Amidst the escalating conflict, the enigmatic entity Kuiba makes a striking entrance.

In the third installment of the animated 'Kuiba Pentalogy' series, 'Kuiba III' unveils the complete roster of the Kuiba Legion, the fearsome 'Twelve Devils,' and introduces the elusive character Ao Jiang. Witness the ground-shaking climax as Kuiba's pulse beast clashes with the Lion pulse beast in a breathtaking showdown.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
